channel.title: Need a Tutor. + REP!
channel.description:
Okay, so... I'm VERY new to rsps coding/java and i'd like if someone would be able to help me LEARN how to code by showing me a few things and making me re-do it.
I don't know what you can do to help but i'd very much appreciate it. Also, if you could direct me towards a few threads that would help me with BOTH PI and Delta coding.
Contact: Skype: CoryRsps, Pm me on here, Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100000045642031
Also, please have teamveiwer if you're going to help me please.
thank you.

item.title: Need a Tutor. + REP!
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Here’s what I would suggest you do.

Learn the basics by reading this tutorial. Get acquainted to terms and such, than just try to use a base that many people use that you can learn from such as PI or Delta. Look at these tutorials to give you an idea of how things are done and just experiment.

As you get more familiar with servers, you will naturally learn more. I’m not encouraging you to just take a base and modify it to call it your own, but learn from what those bases are made of so that you can one day possibly learn make your own.

Feel free to add my MSN, it’s in my sig.

Read full topic
